action.action-desc: Ms. Plaskett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for economic recovery in the possessions of the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Territorial Tax Parity Act of 2017.

section.header: Modification to source rules involving possessions

subsection.text: Section 937(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting the following: to the extent such income is attributable to an office or fixed place of business within the United States (determined under the rules of section 864(c)(5))..

subsection.header: Source rules for personal property sales
subsection.text: Section 865(j)(3) of such Code is amended by adding 932, after 931, and before 933..
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017.
